dimensions.name: Typed State Definitions
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify Pydantic BaseModel/TypedDict usage and reducers (operator.add/operator.ior) for parallel-safe merges.

dimensions.name: Forensic Tool Engineering
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify sandboxed git ops, AST-based parsing, PDF chunking/query, error handling, and no os.system calls.

dimensions.name: Detective Node Implementation
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify detective nodes return structured Evidence objects, handle missing artifacts gracefully, and remain factual.

dimensions.name: Partial Graph Orchestration
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify fan-out detectives + fan-in aggregation with conditional edges and runnable compilation.

dimensions.name: Project Infrastructure
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify reproducible setup: dependencies, .env.example, README instructions, clean structure, no secrets committed.

dimensions.name: Judicial Nuance & Dialectics
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Verify distinct judge personas, structured outputs, and opinions mapped to rubric criteria IDs.
